actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct a project to provide shoreline protection for Maumee Bay State Park, Ohio.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a shoreline protection project for Maumee Bay State Park, Lake Erie, Ohio. States the non-Federal share of the cost of such project.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct a project to provide shoreline protection for Maumee Bay State Park, Ohio.
